column1: #Text=I have 3 daughters, and I told them that Mrs.
#Text=Clinton lost because she did not have a platform.
#Text=If she did, she, and her party, did a poor job explaining it to the masses.
#Text=The only message that I got from her was that Mr.
#Text=Trump is not fit to be in office and that she wanted to be the first female President.
#Text=I honestly believe that she lost because she offered no hope, or direction, to the average American.
#Text=Trump, with all his shortcomings, at least offered change and some hope.
#Text=He now has to make it happen or he will be out of power in 4 years.
